product_name: J.Cat BeautyPink Eyesurance Anti-Fatigue Cooling Under Eye Balm Rosa Canina Fruit Oil Extract
summary: SummaryWake up your eyes with J.Cat Beauty's Pink Eyesurance Anti-Fatigue Cooling Under Eye Balm Rosa Canina Fruit Oil Extract. It preps the skin for smooth makeup application.
details: DetailsBenefitsAntioxidant and cell-generatingKey IngredientsRosa canina fruit oil extractItem 2564798How To UseApply Eyesurance Anti-Fatigue Cooling Under Eye Balm under the eye area and blend. Apply J.Cat Beauty Staysurance Concealer as usual and blend it out. Can be worn alone or under makeup for flawless finish.Precaution: Be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.IngredientsDimethicone (And) Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Paraffin, Hydrogenate Polydecene, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Ethylhexylglycerin, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil.
how_to_use: Apply Eyesurance Anti-Fatigue Cooling Under Eye Balm under the eye area and blend. Apply J.Cat Beauty Staysurance Concealer as usual and blend it out. Can be worn alone or under makeup for flawless finish.Precaution: Be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

reviews.headline: Not what I expected
reviews.comments: I got this and it has no cooling effect! It is just a slightly pink silicone balm. Not exactly what I wanted but I'll try to repurpose it in my collection.

reviews.headline: Not My Favorite
reviews.comments: I bought this thinking it would be cooling and sorta wake me up. didn't do the"cooling" which was advertised.  also, it was really oily. and had an odd finish to it. even though I was not a fan, I gave it to my mom and she loved it. so I guess if you have dry skin or just want an affordable eye product, this is ok.

reviews.headline: 4.5 stars
reviews.comments: Doesn't do much by way of cooling, hence the 1/2 star off. But it DOES smooth out the under eye area nicely. Would definitely repurchase, even though it is a small container. Good thing you don't need a lot of product to do a good job of smoothing eye area.

reviews.headline: Perfect product for slugging under eye area
reviews.comments: This item sat in my drawer after purchase, because it didn't do much.  However, I decided to give slugging a try.  This balm is an absolutely perfect overlay product for slugging under the eyes.  It disappears by morning and doesn't cause breakouts.

reviews.headline: Changed my under eyes!
reviews.comments: I never take the time to write reviews, but this product is amazing! I don't feel any cooling at all, but who cares! It makes my under eye concealer look the best it's ever looked, after I've set it with a setting spray. My under eyes look less puffy and smooth. I'm going to buy extras in case it's ever discontinued. And the price! Such a bargain!

reviews.headline: Not cooling
reviews.comments: This balm isn't cooling but it does make my under eyes very soft and hydrated. I recommend it for that. If you want a cooling effect, I haven't felt it once and i've made a dent in the product. There is a good amount of product for having a small package.

reviews.headline: not cooling but works well
reviews.comments: it isn't cooling at all but it keeps my concealer in place and does a good job with creasing

reviews.headline: AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING
reviews.comments: Run to Ulta and buy this product. It's so soft on the under eyes and makeup goes on very well on top of it. Will continue to purchase this!

reviews.headline: Eh
reviews.comments: it moisturized some, but zero cooling, and almost invisible coverage

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: It's not cooling for long. It goes on clear. I didn't notice a huge difference in creasing but it did help keep my concealer in place.

reviews.headline: Absolutely worthless
reviews.comments: I thought I would give this a whirl to help with my under eye issues. It just created more issues than I had previously. This says pink but it is a clear light pink with no opacity. It is more oily than anything and there was no cooling effect that I noticed. It caused my under eye concealer to settle in my fine lines even more than usual. I love the Aquasurance line but this should be a hard pass.

faceoff_positive.comments: Doesn't do much by way of cooling, hence the 1/2 star off. But it DOES smooth out the under eye area nicely. Would definitely repurchase, even though it is a small container. Good thing you don't need a lot of product to do a good job of smoothing eye area.
faceoff_positive.headline: 4.5 stars

faceoff_negative.comments: I thought I would give this a whirl to help with my under eye issues. It just created more issues than I had previously. This says pink but it is a clear light pink with no opacity. It is more oily than anything and there was no cooling effect that I noticed. It caused my under eye concealer to settle in my fine lines even more than usual. I love the Aquasurance line but this should be a hard pass.
faceoff_negative.headline: Absolutely worthless

rollup.name: Pink Eyesurance Anti-Fatigue Cooling Under Eye Balm Rosa Canina Fruit Oil Extract
